TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of white blood cell that contains granules with enzymes that can kill tumor cells or microbial cells.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "large granular lymphocyte"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "linfocito granular grande"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de glóbulo blanco que contiene gránulos con enzimas que pueden destruir las células tumorales o las células microbianas.
